info.title: Pet Shop API
info.description: The Pet Shop API offers the required HTTP request methods and endpoints to meet the demands of a FE team creating a suitable UI

post.description: Returns the authorization information for an authenticated administrative user.
Logs out the current authenticated administrative user.

get.description: Returns a list of all non-administrative usersinformation.

put.description: Update user information with existing UUID.

message.example: An error occurred while trying to create an administrator user.
An Administrator user cannot be updated.
An error occurred while trying to create an administrator user.

delete.description: Delete user information with existing UUID.

message.example: An error occurred while trying to delete user.
An Administrator user cannot be deleted.
